text: Richard Ewen was an English priest in the second half of the 15th century."he Mendicant Houses of Medieval London, 1221-1539" Röhrkasten, J p275: Munster; LIT Verlag; 2004 Ewen was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1454 to 1458; and Archdeacon of Lincoln from 1458 to 1463. == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:15th-century English people Category:Archdeacons of Lincoln
title: Richard Ewen
